title: Toyota keeps crown as world's top-selling automaker in 2023
description: In 2023, Toyota Motor achieved a global sales record of 11.2 million vehicles, securing its position as the world's top-selling automaker for the fourth consecutive year. The 7.2% increase was driven by robust overseas sales, totaling 8.9 million units. Toyota's parent-only vehicles, including Lexus, reached a record 10.3 million sales, with hybrids comprising one-third and battery electric vehicles less than 1%.
